title: NIST issues EHR guide to improve usability, patient safety
text:
12 NIST issues EHR guide to improve usability, patient safety 
Healthcare IT News: Bad EHR design can lead to data entry errors and risky workarounds that could jeopardize patient safety, according to a new document from NIST, which outlines ways to spot critical areas of risk and methods for improving user-centered design.
